title: Magic Eden's Ethereum Marketplace with Yuga Labs Now Live
description: Magic Eden's new Ethereum marketplace, created in collaboration with Yuga Labs is live today, introducing the industry's first major Ethereum platform to honor creator royalties. Magic Eden, the leading cross-chain NFT platform, and Yuga Labs, the leading web3 lifestyle and media company and home of Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC), Otherside, CryptoPunks, Meebits, Twelvefold, 10KTF and PROOF, joined together with one simple mission: to ensure a thriving web3 ecosystem by recognizing and rewarding th
